ProductInfo.Features:
420 horizontal lines. Built in f 3.6mm Lens. Swivel mount included
Built-in Sony CCD image sensor, color DSP. NTSC system. Minimum Illumination: 1 lux at F1.2
Weatherproof housing. Ideal for indoor, outdoor and covert applications
Small size, discreet installation. Digital automatic backlight compensation
Package included: 4 of SONY CCD cameras, 1 of 4 channel 12V DC 2Amp power supply and 4 of security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 Pack Built-in Sony CCD Outdoor CCTV Bullet Security Cameras 3.6mm Wide Angle for Home Video DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply and Free Security Warning Decals CPA
